footer.motivation: Keep pushing forward. Your best is yet to come.

about.title: About Me
about.p1: I'm Sodiqov Adhamjon G'ayratovich, a passionate frontend developer based in Samarkand, Uzbekistan.
about.p2: I started my journey in web development by learning React, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, gradually building a solid foundation for modern web applications.
about.p3: Currently, I focus on crafting clean, responsive, and user-friendly interfaces that enhance the user experience.
about.p4: I am dedicated to writing maintainable code, optimizing performance, and delivering high-quality projects.
about.p5: Each project I undertake helps me grow and brings me closer to my goal of becoming a skilled and innovative frontend developer.
